short_summary: Replace a gas water heater at the John H. Chapman Centre.
description: Replace a gas water heater at the John H. Chapman Centre in Longueuil, Quebec.
full_summary:
[Title]
**Replacement of a Natural Gas Water Heater**

# Tender Announcement
## Description
The Canadian Space Agency invites Canadian businesses, qualified to practice and hold a Quebec permit, to submit tenders to replace a natural gas water heater located at the John H. Chapman Centre in Longueuil, Quebec. The work must be completed by February 28, 2024.

## Mandatory Information

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding (Concurrentielle, Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Procurement Category**: CNST (construction services) (service de construction)
* **Trade Agreements**: None (Aucun)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada (Canada)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except NCR) (Québec, sauf RCN)

## Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: cb-9045-71046756
* **Solicitation Number**: 9F030-23-0070
* **Publication Date**: 2023-09-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-29T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-10-09
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

## Mandatory Documents
Please refer to the attached documents:

* [English]
	+ Invitation to Tender (ITT)
	+ 2020-134-1033 PLN – MEC (bilingual)
	+ 2020-134-1033 DEV MEC (English)
* [French]
	+ Invitation à soumissionner (IAS)
	+ 2020-134-1033 PLN – MEC (bilingue)
	+ 2020-134-1033 DEV MEC (français)

## Site Visit

You are required to visit the worksite and familiarize yourself with the project. A site visit has been scheduled to be held on September 20, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. (EDT) at the Canadian Space Agency, 6767 Route de l’Aeroport, Saint-Hubert, Qc J3Y 8Y9. Please communicate with the Contracting Authority by September 19, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT) to confirm your attendance.

## Contact Information
For inquiries, please
